name: guiatrend/guiatrend-nextjs
description: Guía Turística de México - Next.js Application

post-install-cmd: which npm || /usr/local/bin/npm install || /opt/cpanel/ea-nodejs16/bin/npm install || echo 'Node.js not found'
post-update-cmd: which npm || /usr/local/bin/npm install || /opt/cpanel/ea-nodejs16/bin/npm install || echo 'Node.js not found'
scripts.build: which npm && npm run build || /usr/local/bin/npm run build || /opt/cpanel/ea-nodejs16/bin/npm run build
scripts.start: which npm && npm start || /usr/local/bin/npm start || /opt/cpanel/ea-nodejs16/bin/npm start
